TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CXProvider extends Foundation.NSObject

Docs.summary: Reports external (out-of-band) events, such as incoming calls, to the system, and receives internal (in-band) user action events from the system.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an object that contains values that control miscellaneous call properties, such as the ringtone, whether the call supports video, the maximum number of callers, and so on.
